column2: This table does not show production of synthetic diamond
So far as possible the amounts shown include estimates for illegal production
So far as possible the amounts shown include estimates for artisanal and/or illegal production
Production of diamond from Ivory Coast has been under United Nations sanctions since 2004. It is believed illegal production continues but it is not possible to estimate the quantity involved.

Production of diamond from Ivory Coast was under United Nations sanctions from 2004 to 2013. It is believed illegal production continued during this period but it is not possible to estimate the quantity involved.
Years ended 31 March following that stated
Under temporary suspension by the Kimberley Process and not trading in rough diamonds; however it is unclear whether production was actually zero in these years
